resources.string: Discover a unique flora and fauna and the landscape of Colombia in the Tatacoa desert, the second largest arid zone in the country

I am Santiago Correa Mu√±oz, I am 25 years old, my birthday is July 21, I live in the city of Medellin, my favorite food is French fries and my favorite activity is reading, I have an administrator degree from ITM and I currently study in the CESDE.
